protocol.text: GeneChip were scanned with Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 7G.
Eleven ug of labelled samples were hybridised to the GeneChip Arabidopsis ATHI at 45ºC for 16.5 hours. Washing and staining were performed using the Fluidic Station-450.

Ten ug of total RNA were used for cDNA synthesis, labeled by in vitro transcription followed by fragmentation according to the manufacturer’s suggestion (GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual rev5, Affymetrix).
The data were analysed using GeneSpring GX11 software and alogrithm RMA as normalisation method.
Arabidopsis thaliana (L. Heyhn.) Columbia (Col-0) were grown in commercial potting soil/perlite (3:2) at 22-24�C day, 17-19�C night temperature under a 15-h-light/9-h-dark photoperiod.
